messages.subject: Japanese clans mausoleums
messages.msgSnippet: Hey friends, While I was reading Japan,Eyes on the Country:Views of the 47 prefectures I saw 2 interesting things: Tumulus of the Mori Shoguns and the Uesugi
messages.messageBody:
Hey friends,

While I was reading "Japan,Eyes on the Country:Views of the 47 prefectures" I saw 2 interesting things: Tumulus of the Mori Shoguns and the Uesugi Family Mausoleum.
Can someone give me some more information on this,please???

Edy

P.S.:Where is the Takeda family buried???????


Eddy
